trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ordnet Aktivitäten zusammen in einer Korrelation zu, indem ein bestimmter freigegebener <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> oder ein flüchtiger Kontext im Workflow dargestellt wird.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/includes/wf-md.md)] provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request-Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Durable Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), and [Context Exchange](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).

[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) node of the [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] Korrelation finden Sie unter [Übersicht über die Korrelation](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), die bestimmte Korrelationstypen erwähnten und den korrelationsbeispielen der [Services [WF-Beispiele] ](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) Knoten der [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] Beispiele.

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: Die Common Language Runtime verwendet die <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> für die Korrelation, sofern vorhanden, andernfalls die **CorrelatesWith** -Eigenschaft der Messagingaktivität verwendet.

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: Wenn keines der beiden Elemente vorhanden ist, wird das von <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> bereitgestellte Ambient-Handle oder der Workflowdienst verwendet.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel veranschaulicht das Festlegen des <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> einer <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply>-Aktivität.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> class.
Registers the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
Unregisters the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Hebt die Registrierung des <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> mit der Workflowlaufzeit auf.
